alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 1:23PM PST until January 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph could cause blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Portions of eastern, north central, northeast and south central Nevada. * WHEN...From 4 PM Saturday to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County
